review_data.title: European disappointment
review_data.content: Usually I look forward to having a snack in European airport hubs— having wonderful beer and maybe a sausage or some hummus is a small and unique pleasure. My experience at Pret has almost made me decide to no longer travel through Zurich. Because of...More

review_data.title: Schöne Aussicht
review_data.content: Hier ist es besonders schön bei Sonnenuntergang. Die Bar ist auf Fluggäste ausgerichtet und es gibt alles auch zum mitnehmen....More

review_data.title: Always reliable
review_data.content: We love Pret! There is a saying in our family - "when all else fails, there is always Pret". It's reliable and you can always count on it to keep you satisfied and, on a cold winter morning, warm! There is quite a variety here...More

review_data.title: Noooooo! Plastic-wrapped mediocrity!
review_data.content: I am devastated! Ready for nice Swiss snacks and a well-kept beer at the bar restaurant in Dock E at Zurich airport, before I board the plane to London, as usual. And they've replaced it with Pret! Nightmare! Overpriced, plastic-wrapped, plastic tasting, wannabe-healthy international cardboard...More
